author: Kliq
title: What creator sets should strive for.
review: This is what it's all about.  A set of bricks with instructions for various different models.  The incredible thing is, these vehicles fit minifigures!  Today's creator sets don't, and that's a big reason why I haven't purchased one for quite some time.  Sure you could MOD it, but this fits minifigs right out of the box.  A little short on the color scheme, but this was one of the first sets I can remember getting, so it has a special place in my heart. :]
